subject: AI & Agents
title: AI Sleep Tracking: Watching You Dream
description: A 60-second lesson on AI Sleep Tracking: Watching You Dream.

hook.text: Your smartwatch knows you had a restless night before you even feel tired. AI tracked your sleep stages.

buildup.text: Sleep trackers use accelerometers and heart rate sensors to classify sleep phases using AI.

discovery.text: AI models distinguish light, deep, and REM sleep with surprising accuracy from wrist movements alone.

twist.text: Knowing your sleep data doesn't automatically improve your sleep. The gap between data and action is real.

punchline.text: AI knows how you slept. Only you can decide to sleep better.
